snippet: Notre Dame Coach Brian Kelly dismissed talk that he needed to do a better job of recruiting players who are better students to avoid academic problems
abstract: Notre Dame coach Brian Kelly dismisses criticism that he needs to do a better job of recruiting players who are better students to avoid academic problems; other college football news noted.
lead_paragraph: Notre Dame Coach Brian Kelly dismissed talk that he needed to do a better job of recruiting players who are better students to avoid academic problems

headline.main: Coach Defends Recruiting at Notre Dame
headline.print_headline: Coach Defends Recruiting at Notre Dame
